description: ECC Hooks - Memory Persistence, Strategic Compact & Code Quality (JS/TS, PHP, Python)

PreToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && tool_input.command matches "(npm run dev|pnpm( run)? dev|yarn dev|bun run dev)"

hooks.command: python3 -c "import sys; print('[Hook] BLOCKED: Dev server must run in tmux for log access', file=sys.stderr); print('[Hook] Use: tmux new-session -d -s dev \"npm run dev\"', file=sys.stderr); print('[Hook] Then: tmux attach -t dev', file=sys.stderr); sys.exit(1)"

PreToolUse.description: Block dev servers outside tmux - ensures you can access logs

hooks.command: python3 -c "import os,sys; os.environ.get('TMUX') or (print('[Hook] Consider running in tmux for session persistence', file=sys.stderr), print('[Hook] tmux new -s dev  |  tmux attach -t dev', file=sys.stderr))"

PreToolUse.description: Reminder to use tmux for long-running commands

hooks.command: python3 -c "import sys; print('[Hook] Review changes before push...', file=sys.stderr); print('[Hook] Continuing with push (remove this hook to add interactive review)', file=sys.stderr)"

PreToolUse.description: Reminder before git push to review changes
Suggest manual compaction at logical intervals

SessionStart.description: Load previous context and detect package manager on new session

hooks.command: python3 -c "import sys,json,re; d=sys.stdin.read(); i=json.loads(d) if d.strip() else {}; cmd=i.get('tool_input',{}).get('command',''); out=i.get('tool_output',{}).get('output',''); m=re.search(r'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/\d+',out) if 'gh pr create' in cmd else None; m and (print(f'[Hook] PR created: {m.group()}',file=sys.stderr), print(f'[Hook] To review: gh pr review {m.group().split("/")[-1]} --repo {m.group().split("/")[3]}/{m.group().split("/")[4]}',file=sys.stderr)); print(d)"

PostToolUse.description: Log PR URL and provide review command after PR creation
Auto-format JS/TS files with Prettier after edit
Run TypeScript type check on TS/TSX files (requires tsconfig.json)
Warn about console.log in JS/TS files after edit
Auto-format PHP files with Pint or PHP-CS-Fixer after edit
Run PHPStan static analysis on PHP files (requires vendor/bin/phpstan)
Warn about debug code (var_dump/print_r/dd/dump/ray) in PHP files after edit
Auto-format Python files with Ruff or Black after edit
Run mypy type check on Python files (requires pyproject.toml or mypy.ini)
Warn about debug code (print/breakpoint/pdb/ic) in Python files after edit

Stop.description: Check for debug code in modified files (JS/TS: console.log, PHP: var_dump/dd/dump/ray, Python: print/breakpoint/pdb/ic)
